generalMsg: Very well, recruit. Your first mission starts right now: our intel tells us the enemy is preparing another attack on our camp soon. VERY SOON. We tested our old anti-missile batteries but our missiles aren't firing! Actually, they do fire, but they won't go where they have to! Something is wrong in how we get our missile speed...
soldierMsg: Oh that's funny! We have the speed, we just have to find a way to return it to whoever needs it...
